name: magiccap
description: A cross platform image capturing suite.
author: Jake Gealer & Rhys O'Kane

scripts.maccompile: electron-packager . MagicCap --platform darwin --arch x64 --out ./build --overwrite --icon icons/app.icns && electron-installer-dmg ./build/MagicCap-darwin-x64/MagicCap.app MagicCap --out=./build --icon=./icons/app.icns
scripts.linuxcompile: electron-packager . MagicCap --platform linux --arch x64 --out ./build --overwrite --icon icons/app.ico && electron-installer-debian --src ./build/MagicCap-linux-x64/ --dest ./build --arch amd64 --icon ./icons/app.icns --options.productName MagicCap --options.name magiccap
